name: The Mors
description: You begin to hear something in the distance, something moving in the dark. You search desperately for anything you can use but your candle begins to flicker. The flame goes out as you are left in complete darkness, you hear the sound enter the room.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32bit or above Processor: Core i3 CPU or above Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or above DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
